most unique game i have played the game is a bit of a slow burn but it really gets going after episode 2 most of your time you are traversing the landscape to make your deliveries and unlock goodies like better gear vehicles weapons etc the game is stunning visually and has some of the best facial animations i have ever seen voice acting is top notch and the game is well optimized i was getting a constant 80 fps on a rtx 3080 on ultra settings
